doc:
Alexis Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexis_Smith 0 Margaret Alexis Smith (June 8, 1921 – June 9, 1993) was a Canadian-born stage, film, and television actress and singer. She appeared in several major Hollywood films in the 1940s and had a notable career on Broadway in the 1970s, winning a Tony Award in 1972. Margaret_Alexis_Smith ( June_8_,_1921 – June_9_,_1993 ) was a_Canadian-born_stage , film , and television_actress_and_singer . She appeared in several_major_Hollywood_films in the_1940s and had a_notable_career on Broadway in the_1970s , winning a_Tony_Award in 1972 .
